dc.title: Advisory Council on Historic Preservation: Preserving America's Heritage [sm]
dc.description: The Advisory Council on Historic Preservation is an independent Federal agency that promotes the preservation, enhancement, and productive use of our Nation's historic resources and advises the President and Congress on national historic preservation policy.
